affiliation.ja: 旧所属 岐阜大学 応用生物科学部
affiliation.en: Former Institution / Organization Gifu University Faculty of Applied Biological Sciences

paper_title.en: Combined effects of Mg and Ca supply on alleviation of Al toxicity in wheat plants

description.en: A Bangladeshi wheat (Triticum aestivum) cultivar, Kalyansona, was exposed to 100 mum Al with varying concentrations of Ca (250, 500, 2,500 mum) and Mg (103, 1,029, 4,115 mum) in the nutrient solution for 14 d. Exposure to Al along with low concentrations of both Ca and Mg caused severe damage to the root apex. Under Al-stressed conditions, an increased supply of Mg from 103 to 1,029 mum enhanced the root length by 44, 22, and 3% at 250, 500, and 2,500 mum Ca, respectively. Root growth at 2,500 mum Ca was not affected by additional Mg concentration. Again, an increased supply of Mg from 103 to 4,115 mum enhanced the root length by 56% at 500 mum Ca. Under the Al-stressed conditions, the increase in the root length was correlated with the decrease in the Al content in roots. Our results suggest that Mg alleviates Al toxicity efficiently in the presence of Ca at a low level in the culture solution by decreasing Al accumulation in roots.

paper_title.en: Effects of aluminum and boron supply on growth of seedlings among 15 cultivars of wheat (Riticum aestivum L.) grown in Bangladesh

description.en: Aluminum toxicity and boron deficiency are the major factors that limit plant growth and development in acid soils and in B-deficient soils. Root growth inhibition is an early symptom of Al toxicity and B deficiency. Effects of Al and B supply and their interaction on the growth of wheat (Triticum aestivum L.) seedlings were investigated using hydroponics. Fifteen wheat cultivars commonly grown in Bangladesh were used and found to differ considerably in their tolerance to Al toxicity and B deficiency. The relative root length of all the wheat cultivars at 50 muM Al (pH 4.5) ranged from 27 to 71% relative to the control (0 muM Al). Among the cultivars, Inia66 and Kalyansona were found to be the most Al-tolerant and sensitive cultivars, respectively, based on the data of relative root length, malate exudation and Al content of roots. Malate was detected in all the cultivars in the presence of 100 muM Al (pH 4.3). Inia66 exuded a 6-fold larger amount of malate and the Al content of roots was 4 times lower than that in Kalyansona. The vigorous seedling growth was observed at 40 muM B among the series of B treatments. Considerable cultivar differences in response to 40 muM B were observed among the 15 cultivars. Kalyansona was considered to be the most sensitive and Kheri the most tolerant to B deficiency. The interaction effects of B (40 and 200 muM) and Al (50 muM) on seedling growth were also examined in Inia66 and Kalyansona. Root growth was inhibited in the presence of Al but B supply especially at 200 muM B in the Kalyansona cultivar caused a slight improvement.

publisher.en: JAPANESE SOC SOIL SCIENCE PLANT NUTRITION

paper_title.en: Ameliorative effect of silicon on aluminum injury in the rice plant
Ameliorative effect of silicon on aluminum injury in the rice plant
Effect of aluminum and silicon in solution on the growth of rice(┣DBOryga(/)-┫DB ┣DBsativa(/)-┫DB L. )suspension cells.
Varietal differences in the growth of rice plants in response to aluminum and silicon

description.en: Effects of Al (0-100 mu M) and Si (0-2,000 mu M) supplied singly or in combination on root growth of different rice varieties were examined under hydroponic conditions. Al addition inhibited root elongation of rice plants, and the inhibition increased with increasing amount of Al in the culture solution. Among 22 indica varieties and among 8 japonica varieties tested, IAC3 and Nakateshin-senbon were relatively tolerant to Al, respectively, whereas IR45 and Norin1 were relatively sensitive to Al, respectively. Si exerted a beneficial effect at all levels of Si treatment on indica varieties, whereas Si supply resulted in a slight increase in the root dry weight of japonica varieties only at the highest level (2,000 mu M Si). The alleviation of Al inhibition of rice root growth by Si was observed in the combination of Al and Si treatments. Alleviation was more pronounced for all the Si treatments in indica varieties than in japonica varieties, and the alleviation was maximum with 2,000 mu M Si in IR45. The alleviation effect by Si was more pronounced in the Al-sensitive varieties than in the Al-tolerant. varieties. The application of Si resulted in an increase in the contents of Al and Si in plants, and there was no relationship between the Al content and Al inhibition in plants.

paper_title.ja: ケイ素添加がイネのアルミニウム障害の軽減およびイネ体内アルミニウム形態に及ぼす影響(共著)
paper_title.en: Effects of Silicon Supply on Amelioration of Aluminum Injury and Chemical Forms of Aluminum in Rice Plants

description.ja: Rice plants were water-cultured with a combination of aluminum (0, 0.2, 0.8 mmol L^<-1>) and silicon (0, 3.0 mmol L^<-1>) in a 0.5 mmol L^<-1> Ca(NO_3)_2 solution, and both elements with different chemical forms in the plant organs were determined to evaluate the effects of silicon supply on the amelioration of aluminum injury to the plants. This culture solution was renewed every day during the treatment period (4 d). Plant growth, especially root growth, decreased with the increase of aluminum (Al) concentration in the culture solution, but the silicon supply alleviated plant growth. Total Al, water-soluble polymer Al and water-insoluble polymer Al contents in the roots and leaves tended to increase more in the presence of silicon than in the absence of silicon, and water-soluble monomer Al content in the leaves decreased. These results suggest that the ameliorative effects of silicon on aluminum injury to rice may be attributed to ; (1) growth improvement by silicon itself, (2) a decrease in aluminum concentration due to silicon in the culture solution and (3) the alteration of aluminum chemical forms in solutions and plants by silicon, resulting in a decrease in aluminum toxicity.
description.en: Rice plants were water-cultured with a combination of aluminum (0, 0.2, 0.8 mmol L^<-1>) and silicon (0, 3.0 mmol L^<-1>) in a 0.5 mmol L^<-1> Ca(NO_3)_2 solution, and both elements with different chemical forms in the plant organs were determined to evaluate the effects of silicon supply on the amelioration of aluminum injury to the plants. This culture solution was renewed every day during the treatment period (4 d). Plant growth, especially root growth, decreased with the increase of aluminum (Al) concentration in the culture solution, but the silicon supply alleviated plant growth. Total Al, water-soluble polymer Al and water-insoluble polymer Al contents in the roots and leaves tended to increase more in the presence of silicon than in the absence of silicon, and water-soluble monomer Al content in the leaves decreased. These results suggest that the ameliorative effects of silicon on aluminum injury to rice may be attributed to ; (1) growth improvement by silicon itself, (2) a decrease in aluminum concentration due to silicon in the culture solution and (3) the alteration of aluminum chemical forms in solutions and plants by silicon, resulting in a decrease in aluminum toxicity.

paper_title.ja: ユーチャリス・グランディフローラの新栽培方法と温室内の環境(共著)
paper_title.en: New Cultivation Method and Environments in Greenhouse of Eucharis Grandiflora

description.ja:
ユーチャリス・グランディフローラの開花を向上させる栽培方法を検討し, 以下の結果を得た.
1.栽培ベッドダクト方式では苗床の下からビニールダクトによって土壌温度を上げ, 冬期温室内の暖房も兼ねようとした.この方法は時間的にも早く設置できる利点があり施設費用が安く, 他のベッドや温室内に熱を逃さないようにミニハウスを設置し, 1ベッドずつ覆った.しかしミニハウス内の温度調整が困難で, ミニハウスによる遮光により葉のみ徒長し, 開花率が極端に悪かった. 栽培ベッド鉄パイプ方式 (鉄パイプにより温湯を供給する方法) では土壌温度のコントロールが正確にでき, 高温処理を順次行うことによって1年を通じて花の出荷ができた.開花率はダクト方式より鉄パイプ方式が4倍以上であり, 鉄パイプ方式が開花向上に役立った.
2.燃料の消費は栽培ベッドダクト方式は鉄パイプ方式の3倍であり, 鉄パイプ方式は燃料消費を節約できた.
3.葉に受ける光の照度によって開花率が大きく変化した.徒長した葉は最少限度3枚を残し, 徒長葉を切り取ると同時に球根定植後3～4年ごとに掘り上げ親球から子球を除去し, 直ちに定植して開花率を向上させるべきであると考えられた.
description.en:
New cultivation method was investigated to increase the flowering rate of Eucharis grandiflora.
1. The soil temperature was risen by vinyl ducts from the underside of a nursery in the duct system of the cultivation bed. This method served also to heat the greenhouse in winter season. This method resulted in cheap investment in facility and had such an advantage of rapid installation. In order to prevent heat from escaping to the greenhouse and other beds, we installed a minihouse and covered beds one by one. However, heat was stayed in the minihouse and we found it hard to adjust the temperature. These leaves were grown uselessly due to light shading of the minihouse, resulting in an extreme poor rate of flowering. The method to circulate hot water through iron pipes in soil of the cultivating bed. The iron piping method system could control the soil temperature correctly. The flowering rate of the iron piping system was 4 times as high as that of the duct system, proving that the iron piping system was found useful to improve flowering rate.
2. Fuel consumption of the duct system was 3 times as high as that of the iron piping system. In the iron piping system, fuel could be saved by that quantity.
3. It was found that the flowering rate was influenced markedly by illuminance of light. This result led us to consider as follows :
Without 3 elongation leaves, all elongation leaves must be cut. Every 3-4 years after planting of bulbs, they must be dug out and bulblets must be removed from father bulbs. After disinfecting, they shall be planted immediately for the purpose of improvement of flowering rate.

paper_title.en: New cultivation method and environments in greenhouse of Euclaris grandiflora

description.ja:
ユーチャリス・グランディフローラの開花を向上させる栽培方法を検討し, 以下の結果を得た.
1.栽培ベッドダクト方式では苗床の下からビニールダクトによって土壌温度を上げ, 冬期温室内の暖房も兼ねようとした.この方法は時間的にも早く設置できる利点があり施設費用が安く, 他のベッドや温室内に熱を逃さないようにミニハウスを設置し, 1ベッドずつ覆った.しかしミニハウス内の温度調整が困難で, ミニハウスによる遮光により葉のみ徒長し, 開花率が極端に悪かった. 栽培ベッド鉄パイプ方式 (鉄パイプにより温湯を供給する方法) では土壌温度のコントロールが正確にでき, 高温処理を順次行うことによって1年を通じて花の出荷ができた.開花率はダクト方式より鉄パイプ方式が4倍以上であり, 鉄パイプ方式が開花向上に役立った.
2.燃料の消費は栽培ベッドダクト方式は鉄パイプ方式の3倍であり, 鉄パイプ方式は燃料消費を節約できた.
3.葉に受ける光の照度によって開花率が大きく変化した.徒長した葉は最少限度3枚を残し, 徒長葉を切り取ると同時に球根定植後3～4年ごとに掘り上げ親球から子球を除去し, 直ちに定植して開花率を向上させるべきであると考えられた.
description.en:
New cultivation method was investigated to increase the flowering rate of Eucharis grandiflora.
1. The soil temperature was risen by vinyl ducts from the underside of a nursery in the duct system of the cultivation bed. This method served also to heat the greenhouse in winter season. This method resulted in cheap investment in facility and had such an advantage of rapid installation. In order to prevent heat from escaping to the greenhouse and other beds, we installed a minihouse and covered beds one by one. However, heat was stayed in the minihouse and we found it hard to adjust the temperature. These leaves were grown uselessly due to light shading of the minihouse, resulting in an extreme poor rate of flowering. The method to circulate hot water through iron pipes in soil of the cultivating bed. The iron piping method system could control the soil temperature correctly. The flowering rate of the iron piping system was 4 times as high as that of the duct system, proving that the iron piping system was found useful to improve flowering rate.
2. Fuel consumption of the duct system was 3 times as high as that of the iron piping system. In the iron piping system, fuel could be saved by that quantity.
3. It was found that the flowering rate was influenced markedly by illuminance of light. This result led us to consider as follows :
Without 3 elongation leaves, all elongation leaves must be cut. Every 3-4 years after planting of bulbs, they must be dug out and bulblets must be removed from father bulbs. After disinfecting, they shall be planted immediately for the purpose of improvement of flowering rate.
